inclusion.criterion: urodynamic Stress urinary incontinence confirmed by urodynamic studies
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand spoken and written English
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Severe pelvic organ prolapse (> or = stage 3 on the Pelvic Organ Prolapse Quantification System - POP-Q)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Contraindications to pessary use (including acute vaginal/urinary or pelvic infections, vaginal or cervical lesions or unexplained vaginal bleeding)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to properly fit the incontinence ring
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has symptoms of urinary stress urinary incontinence and is able to understand spoken and written English. However, she may have severe pelvic organ prolapse or contraindications to pessary use.
